song.title: Methane Rain
song.info:
Originally made for demo Rowan Berries by Traction [url]http://www.pouet.net/prod.php?which=61216[/url] but Preacher wanted to use the older ambient track for it in the end.
Later i sent it to be used in Spacenight videos, see [url]http://www.pouet.net/topic.php?which=9223&page=1[/url] but no idea if they'll use it.
Later also used for another Preacher demo at Revision 2014.
